Author: Tristan2369
Description:
A port of MolarBison32067's Blue Menu Mod without the in game UI changes. It drives me crazy how hard it is to notice when a patch or update comes out.

This will change your menu background to a dark theme and menu items to be blue. When an update happens, disabling the mod and making the interface go back to the default red, it makes the loss of mods more noticable then just a background swap. 

To use a different background just put it earlier in the mod ######## list (the buttons should remain blue)
Title: Blue Menu (Menus Only)
